attributes.action: be more responsive to petitions and avoid goverment dismissals and cop outs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Responses to Petitions on Road pricing, 1911 Cencus returns and Sea angling amonst others have shown total disregard to the high numbers of petition supporters. The responses have merely mirrored the goverment views making the Petition system a farce.
